keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives will not cut spending on the NHS – in fact, they will increase NHS spending every year. They will ensure new cancer drugs are available on the NHS as they are in the rest of Europe.

issues.health: The Conservatives will not cut spending on the NHS – in fact, they will increase NHS spending every year. A Conservative government will NOT stop you getting your NHS treatment within 18 weeks – or stop you seeing a cancer specialist within two weeks. In fact, because we will increase health spending and cut out waste in the NHS, we'll be able to help you get the care you need even more quickly.

politicalExperience.role: Top cancer specialist and former Labour adviser

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Alan Mabbutt on behalf of the Conservative Party, both at 30 Millbank, London SW1P 4DP.

endorsements.endorsement: Labour are desperate to cling onto power that they are scaremongering about Conservative plans for the NHS. I would not stand shoulder to shoulder with David Cameron and Andrew Lansley unless I was absolutely convinced that the NHS would be safe in their hands.

images.caption: Cancer specialist Professor David Kerr explains why he backs Conservative plans for the NHS.
